name: INTREPID GEEKS
description: intrepid Geeks is an educational application designed to solve these basic problems in educational domain :-  1. Providing assistance to students as mentors on a single platform .  2. Providing standard study material for school and college students for academics in the form of notes and videos .  3. Making a student friendly environment where students from various domains can interact with each other .  4. Assessing students by giving customised questions and test papers.  5. Embedding a sense of practicality among students by giving customised content from our side.  6. Acting as a bridge between college students and companies so that they can get good opportunities with better guidance.  7. Discovering new methods of counselling and making the education as student friendly as possible. This application is meant for :- (1) School students from class 6th to 12th (2) Engineering students  (3) Students preparing for government exams  (4) Students seeking counselling for admissions in universities and colleges of India .
